The AI model used to write the story text for each page. GPT-5 models might produce more accurate but less creative stories.
The AI model that interprets image descriptions and directs the image renderer. GPT-5 models are slower but might be more reliable.
The model that actually draws the images. The larger models produce higher-quality illustrations but are slower and cost more.
